msgs.warn: You've been warned for '{reason}'. Don't worry, this a minor infraction, just don't do it again. You've been muted for {length} minutes.
msgs.warn_no_reason: You've been warned. Don't worry, this a minor infraction, just don't do it again.  You've been muted for {length} minutes.
msgs.strike_auto: You've been auto-striked for receiving 3 warnings. 5 strikes is a ban, so think about what you do before you do it. You've been muted for {length} minutes.
msgs.strike_manual_no_reason: You've been striked. This is a major infraction, think about what you do before you do it. You've been muted for {length} minutes.
msgs.strike_manual: You've been striked for '{reason}'. This is a major infraction, think about what you do before you do it. You've been muted for {length} minutes.
